The forecasts generated by Holt’s linear method display a constant trend (increasing
or decreasing) indecently into the future. Even more extreme are the forecasts
generated by the exponential trend method [...] Motivated by this observation [...]
introduced a parameter that “dampens” the trend to a ﬂat line some time in the
future.
— Page 183, Forecasting: Principles and Practice, 2013.
